lead_paragraph: Second-place Napoli was held to a 1-1 draw at Fiorentina, allowing Juventus to open up a 3-point lead with 11 rounds remaining in the Italian league.

headline.print_headline: Napoli Is Held to a Tie
headline.main: Napoli Is Held to a Tie

snippet: Second-place Napoli was held to a 1-1 draw at Fiorentina, allowing Juventus to open up a 3-point lead with 11 rounds remaining in the Italian league.
